messages.subject: safety rules
messages.msgSnippet: ... In the absence of a bunch of rules, the space becomes flooded with a bunch of thought and good judgment. I felt the need to isolate this brilliant
messages.messageBody:
>"Speaking of families which have begun their mindful parenting early on:
In the absence of a bunch of rules, the space becomes flooded with a bunch of
thought and good judgment."

I felt the need to isolate this brilliant statement. As the mom of three
teenagers who consistently make great choices it speaks volumes. Go, Sandra.

Similiar in flavor, was one a ways back that was along these lines . . .
I'd rather have influence on my children forever than control for a short
time -

Don't remember who spoke along those lines, but it was another keeper.

Aloha, Lee

messages.subject: safety rules
messages.msgSnippet: ... I can ... else I ... I can guarantee that is not what you will be remembered for, Sandra! But, an admirable super-hero power, for sure!! Love, Lee North
messages.messageBody:
>My best super-hero power (maybe my only one) is cutting tomatoes. I can cut
>bread, too, with a good bread knife (or a tomato <g>). I'm not so great at
>cutting meat (like carving a turkey or whatever) but with a serrated knife
I can
>get more slices from a loaf of homemmade bread or a tomato than anyone
else I
>know.
>
>Sandra

I can guarantee that is not what you will be remembered for, Sandra! But,
an admirable super-hero power, for sure!!
Love, Lee
